title: [Health] Non-communicable disease risk associated with red and processed meat consumptionâ€” when meat consumption is part of healthy dietary patterns, harmful associations tend to disappear, suggesting that risk is more likely to be contingent on the dietary context rather than meat itself

[Health] In the US , youth who have been previously involved with the juvenile justice system had up to 23 times the rate of firearm mortality than the general population. Firearm mortality rates for most demographic groups in the study were significantly higher than the general population.
